title: Dumping of construction material outside the property in forest or in natural water course is strictly prohibited
clause_text: Dumping of construction material outside the property in forest or in natural water course is strictly prohibited. (1) REGULATIONS FOR AREAS SITUATED ABOVE 1000 m. OF MEAN SEA LEVEL IN SATARA REGION.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Dumping of construction material outside the property in forest or in natural water course is strictly prohibited. (1)
